snippet: Mayor Bloomberg must require the New York City Housing Authority to draft a workable emergency response plan for public housing that it did not have for Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Editorial criticizes response by New York City's bureaucracy to needs of its most vulnerable citizens in public housing in wake of Hurricane Katrina; calls on working group established by Mayor Michael Bloomberg to take hard look at overall management of New York City Housing Authority and to require workable emergency response plan for public housing.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bloomberg must require the New York City Housing Authority to draft a workable emergency response plan for public housing that it did not have for Hurricane Sandy.
